vibesExplanation:
The video titled 'Full Body Stretching Routine (15 min. Follow Along)' from the channel 'Strength Side' emphasizes a low-stress, flexibility-focused workout. Additionally, phrases such as 'opening up all the ranges of motion' and 'no equipment or gym needed' suggest a relaxed, breath-centered flow, characteristics of 'The Zen Flow,' meriting a score of 0.7.

This justifies a moderate score of 0.6 for 'The Foundation Builder.'

The choice of vibes is influenced by the video's emphasis on gentle, intentional movement for a wide audience, including beginners and older adults, as evidenced by user comments. No high-intensity or complex skill-building is indicated, therefore excluding other vibes such as 'The Warrior Workout' or 'The Masterclass Workout.'
